definition: deserving or inciting pity, people without possessions or wealth (considered as a group)
details:
adjective
- deserving or inciting pity
= synonyms: miserable
- unsatisfactory
= example: unsatisfactory
- having little money or few possessions
= example: having little money or few possessions
- lacking in specific resources, qualities or substances
= example: lacking in specific resources, qualities or substances
- characterized by or indicating poverty
= example: characterized by or indicating poverty
- not sufficient to meet a need
= synonyms: short
noun
- people without possessions or wealth (considered as a group)
= example: people without possessions or wealth (considered as a group)
= synonyms: poor people
